DOC.detailed_description: Double blind Randomized Controlled Trial ( RCT ) : clinician patent blind allocation group . A total 137 embryo transfer randomly allocate either arm I ( 67 ) start luteal support daily IM injection 100 mg prontogest day egg retrieval , arm II ( 66 ) start P4 dose day embryo transfer
